review: I bought this tool vs. the Oxo strawberry huller mainly due to seeing the video review here.  The person hulling those berries was able to make quick work of it and did hardly any damage to the berry itself.I brought home almost 8 lbs of strawberries yesterday and nearly all of them hulled in 30 minutes!  And just the hulls and stems were taken out, the berries were absolutely unharmed.  Really great product!
